strategy_tips: Keep the bait in place longer than feels natural—vertical wins by time-in-zone, not distance.
On calm water, extend cast distance and tighten cadence—subtle presentations often outperform noise.
Bright conditions: prioritize shade/edges and make your best casts count before cycling targets.
If the pattern stalls, change one variable at a time—angle, cadence, or a similar lure within the same presentation.
